stateful.title: Stateful
stateful.description: If true, the switch remains on instead of being automatically turned off.

logCmd.title: logCmd
logCmd.description: If true, the onCmd & offCmd will be displayed in the Homebridge logs.

onCmd.title: On Command
onCmd.description: CLI command that is executed when the switch state changes from off to on.

offCmd.title: Off Command
offCmd.description: CLI command that is executed when the switch state changes from on to off.

delay.title: Delay
delay.description: Timeout value in the unit specified by the argument 'delayUnit' after which the switch turns off itself. If not specified, defaults to 100 units. Only evaluated for stateless switches. If interactiveDelay is specified, this specifies the initial value.

delayUnit.title: Delay Unit
delayUnit.description: Unit, in which the values for 'delay' are specified. Defaults to milliseconds (ms).

interactiveDelay.title: Interactive Delay
interactiveDelay.description: Flag to indicate if the timeout value for a stateless switch can be directly changed in a supported HomeKit app like 'Eve for HomeKit'. Defaults to false.

interactiveDelayLabel.title: Interactive Delay Label
interactiveDelayLabel.description: Specifies the label that is used to display the interactive delay value. Defaults to 'Delay'.

delayMin.title: Minimum Delay
delayMin.description: Minimum timeout value that can be set interactively for a stateless switch. Defaults to 100 units.

delayMax.title: Maximum Delay
delayMax.description: Maximum timeout value that can be set interactively for a stateless switch. Defaults to 1000 units.

delayStep.title: Delay Step
delayStep.description: Step value used to increment or decrement the timeout value that can be set interactively for a stateless switch. Defaults to 100 units.
